description: Try our easy to follow Sugar Snap Peas With Crunchy Parmesan recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Sugar Snap Peas With Crunchy Parmesan Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill to medium high. Top and tail peas and remove strings from sides. Place in a single layer in a shallow baking tray.

Combine parmesan, breadcrumbs, oil and garlic, if using, in a small bowl. Season to taste and mix together well. Scatter crumb mixture over peas and grill for 3-5 minutes or until golden. Garnish with pea shoots and serve immediately.
